sqlMap.select: select course_no as "no", course_name as "name", course_summary as "summary", course_detail as "detail", course_point as "point", lecturer_no as "lecturer.no", dept_no as "dept.no" from course

select course_no as "no", course_name as "name", course_summary as "summary", course_detail as "detail", course_point as "point", lecturer_no as "lecturer.no", dept_no as "dept.no" from course where course_no = #value#

select course_no as "no", course_name as "name", course_summary as "summary", course_detail as "detail", course_point as "point", lecturer_no as "lecturer.no", dept_no as "dept.no" from course where lecturer_no = #value#

select course_no as "no", course_name as "name", course_summary as "summary", course_detail as "detail", course_point as "point", lecturer_no as "lecturer.no", dept_no as "dept.no" from course where dept_no = #value#

select "courseNo", "boardName", "picture", "detail", "lecturerName", "qty", "point", "name", "summary" from (SELECT row_number() over (order by A.course_no asc) as "m", A.COURSE_NO as "courseNo", A.COURSE_NAME as "boardName", B.LECTURER_PICTURE as "picture", A.COURSE_DETAIL as "detail", B.LECTURER_NAME as "lecturerName", (select count(*) from course_video where COURSE_NO = A.course_no) as "qty", A.COURSE_POINT as "point", c.DEPT_NAME as "name", A.course_summary as "summary"
from COURSE A, LECTURER B, DEPT C
where B.Lecturer_no = A.LECTURER_NO and A.DEPT_NO = C.dept_no order by A.DEPT_NO asc ) where "m" >= #beginIndex# and "m" <= #endIndex#
